org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes
Class AtomColorByElement

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes.AtomColorByElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAtomColor
public class AtomColorByElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAtomColor

This class implements the AtomColor interface by applying a color to the given atomIndex+Atom by using the ElementColor class.

Author:
John L. Moreland
See Also:
IAtomColor, Atom, PeriodicTable, Element, ElementStyles
